column1: Kangaroos are four [1] from the family [2] ([3], meaning "[4] [4]").
As with the terms "[1]" and "[2]", "kangaroo" refers to a [3] grouping of species.
column5: The largest species in the family are called kangaroos" and the smallest are generally called "wallabies". The term "wallaroos" refers to species of an intermediate size."
